title: Dashboard Home Rendering
description: Verify the Dashboard home page loads correctly with all KPI cards, user growth charts, and risk matrices displayed in Bento Grid layout.

steps.description: Navigate to the Dashboard home page after login
Check that all KPI cards, User Growth Chart, and Risk Matrix components are visible and correctly rendered
Verify the Bento Grid layout aligns properly without overflow or clipping on desktop and mobile

title: Sidebar Navigation Functionality
description: Ensure the Sidebar navigation updates active state correctly when navigating between Dashboard, Projects, and CI/CD Pipeline pages.

steps.description: Click the Sidebar link for Dashboard
Verify the Dashboard page loads and Sidebar highlights the Dashboard link
Click the Sidebar link for Projects
Verify the Projects page loads and Sidebar highlights the Projects link
Click the Sidebar link for CI/CD Pipeline
Verify the CI/CD Pipeline page loads and Sidebar highlights the CI/CD link

title: Theme Switching and UI Consistency
description: Validate that light and dark modes toggle correctly from the Theme Provider and all UI elements, including sidebar, dashboards, and cards update styles accordingly with no visual glitches.

steps.description: Switch the theme from light to dark mode using the UI toggle
Verify all components adopt the dark mode styling following color guidelines, including Projects and CI/CD pages
Switch back to light mode
Confirm all components revert to light mode styling consistently with no layout shifts

title: Responsive Layout on Various Screen Sizes
description: Test the responsiveness of all main pages (Dashboard, Projects, CI/CD) ensuring no content overflow or UI element obstruction occurs on mobile devices and ultra-wide monitors.

steps.description: Resize browser window to typical mobile width (375px)
Verify layout rearranges fluidly with no overflow, text clipping or UI obstruction
Resize browser window to ultra-wide monitor width (>1920px)
Confirm the layout maintains max-width constraints and content remains centered and readable

title: Kanban Board Drag and Drop
description: Validate drag-and-drop functionality for moving tasks across different Kanban columns and check persistence of the updated state after page refresh.

steps.description: Navigate to the Projects page and open the Kanban board
Drag a task card from one status column to another
Verify the task card visually moves to the target column
Refresh the page
Verify the task remains in the new column reflecting state persistence locally or via backend

title: Projects Search and Filtering
description: Test the search input functionality on the Projects listing page and Kanban board to ensure live client-side filtering returns accurate results.

steps.description: Navigate to the Projects listing page
Enter a search term in the project search input
Verify that the project list filters in real-time to match the search term
Clear the search input
Verify that the full project list is shown again

title: CI/CD Pipeline Visualization Updates
description: Verify that the CI/CD pipeline page shows detailed visualization of pipeline stages and dynamically updates running and pending step statuses in real-time.

steps.description: Navigate to the CI/CD Pipeline page
Ensure all pipeline stages and steps are displayed with correct initial statuses
Observe for real-time simulation updates where running/pending steps periodically change their status dynamically

title: Chart Tooltip Visibility and Z-Index
description: Check that tooltips on all charts, such as user growth charts and KPI cards, appear fully visible and are not clipped or hidden behind other UI elements.

steps.description: Hover over various data points on charts in the Dashboard and Business Command Center
Verify tooltips appear promptly, fully visible with proper z-index layering above other controls

title: Hydration and SSR Handling
description: Ensure that the application has no React hydration warnings by correctly handling server-side rendering, especially for theme toggling and localStorage access for Kanban state.

steps.description: Load any main page (Dashboard, Projects, or CI/CD) in production mode
Check console logs to confirm no hydration warnings or errors are present
Toggle theme and refresh the page
Verify hydration remains clean and theme state persists without warnings

title: Localization and Language Consistency
description: Validate that all user-facing text throughout the application is consistent in language, and centralized string management prevents mixed language or untranslated strings.

steps.description: Navigate through all main pages and UI components including Sidebar, Dashboard KPIs, Project cards, Kanban labels, and CI/CD pipeline questions
Verify all text is in the expected language without mixed or missing translations

title: Visual Effects Performance on Lower-End Devices
description: Assess the visual effects such as glassmorphism and animations using Framer Motion on low-end devices to confirm smooth performance without UI jank or degradation.

steps.description: Access the app on a lower-end or throttled device/browser setup
Observe UI transitions, glassmorphism effects, and animations for smoothness without frame drops or freezes

title: Code Quality and Bundle Optimization Validation
description: Verify that the codebase has no unused imports and passes performance audits for bundle size optimization, especially for Recharts and Framer Motion libraries.

steps.description: Run static code analysis tools and bundle size analyzer on the production build
Check that no unused imports are reported and bundle sizes are within acceptable limits without redundant dependencies
